objectDesc.p: Palm-leaf manuscript. 47 leaves in Merapi-Merbabu script, using layar in Indonesian mode. Apparently written in year 1564 of an uncertain era.

projectDesc.p: This project has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

body.ab:
// // Om̐ Avighnamastu // // kīraṇaḥ viyaktiḥ candraghniḥ, dvijodaḥ koviḥ marutaraḥ, nahan· bhyakta pinakaśarira bhaṭāra, milv aja:nma gave bhuvaṇa sira ta:ṣvatanu ṅaranira, sīra ta:ṣvadeśomidәṙ pinakavәṅku, sira t ahuripnikaṁ rat·, sira dumadyakәn· vr̥
ddhiniṁ janma kabeḥ, praṇapraṇī saṙvva hurip· Ikanaṅ u:rip· lavan avak·, śarira pamisanya riṁ sadharadeya, magumavay ikaṁ saṙvvadadī, sira: sinaṅguḥ purvvaniṁ janma Umijil taṅ a:ṣṭatanu rat·, nara mr̥gha paśu janma svavara, pakṣī śarīśr̥pa miṇa, prabhavaniṅ adharadeya prabhu ra:ma R̥ṣī
tiga sira, prammana riṁ rat·, pakәniṁ bhuvaṇa, tuvi sīra tan duḥkha piś ikī guruniṁ janma: kabeḥ, līnraranikiṁ candanira ṅkaṇa, sira tika sidaguru, sīra haṣṭa:gaṇa gumavay ikaṁ vaṙva:sәk lumraḥ Ikaṅ a:kṣaropamavak·, Ika ta guru ṅaranya, yekī tuvin a:stu hurip·, ya sinaṅguḥ guru laghu
ya panakamula canda, Avakniṁka guru la:ghu, lavann urip masaṁyoga, Umijil tikaṁ trigaṇa Adәghnikaṁ guru la:ghu, haniga-nigeṁ sagaṇa, yeka:ṣṭagaṇa ṅaranya, sama ha:byapare vatva:ṙ mvaṁ laku śloka nihan len·, // // sakveḥ saṁ sujana:dihaṙṣa hirikaṁ canda: nihan kavruhī, yan ma
1
hyun· vruha rupaniṁ laghu lavan tika: sinaṅguḥ guru, bhaiddha:niṁ guru la:ghu yeṅtakna: mvaṁ huṅgvaniṁ hakṣara, sakveḥniṁ guru yeriṅә:n hila-hileka: yan· salaḥ ka:svanan· bhyakta:niṁ guru saṙvva diṙgha taruṅa: saṁyogapa:ranṅәn·, lavan· vakaṙṇna visaṙjja ka:niśurahan· śvara: vatә
k· vyañjana, E Ai, nahan anuṁ kayatnakna len· hoho vkasniṁ guru, vus meṅә:t pva kiterikha: niyata yan· śotan ta dadya vacan· lviṙniṁ hakṣara gantuṅәn mapakne vakta mvaṅ aṅgantuṅa, saṁyoga:para śūkṣma lakṣmaṇa śivaghnī kleṣa lakṣmi khunaṁ, nda:n· gla:na stula ṇaghna vighna mamәvә: niṙ
vighna ma:ra stitī, svapna sneha rikaṁ dvitiya khahaḍaṁ riṁ dla:ha yan paphala ṅahniṁ tikṣṇa murub· riṅ agni ya khaton· rasminya sateja ya, masna:na pva kiteṁ nadī masīh ikaṁ saslesma tumla:ṅa:kәn·, riṁ sma:ruṅgva sahiṣnu nora pinaṅan· maṅliḥ maṅaṅgantuṅa, yapvan· bheddha sakoja
rojarakna maṅke ṅaliknya vacan·, gәlaṇa saṁ lagәna n· para riṁ sәma, vighәna tiksaṇa yogi riṁ tulya ya, divadaśeka tahunya saniṙypaghәna, masupәna pva vadu sumәneha ya vagәmi yan saḍәmiṅ ahәmi haḍi, tuvi kәleṣa vinaṁśa ṣalakṣәmi, sәpinikaṁ
brata maṙgganikan· kәL̥m·, kramaniṅ akṣara yan· jinaja:r ika lvīṙniṁ saṁyogaparekī, kakyan-kakyan kakvan-kakvan·, kakran hanṅәn aṅgantuṁ, kayatnakәn· tmәn·-tmәn· Antaḥpada guru yati, kalavan· śvara kamadya, diṙ=gha:-diṙ=gha: vattavatī, tavat· guru
praśiddha ya diṙ=gha: turuṅa surahan·, visaṙ=ja: lavann ajuṁjuṁ, kalavan· guru saṁyoga, nahan taṁ sinaṅguḥ guru nihan taṁ śvara kamadya, A A I Ī U Ū E O, tan dadi muṅguḥ riṁ tṅaḥ, vvittan juga paknanya sampun ikaṁ pratekanikanaṁ guru dinliṅakәn·, nya t ajaR̥n muvaḥ padulu
riṁ guru laghu vuvusәn·, kveḥnya savargga muṅguh ikanaṁ vacan aniga-niga, yeka sinaṅguhan gaṇa ṅaranya sipatiṅ akavi puṙvva nihan maka:ra ṅaraniṁ guru tiga sagaṇa, la:ghu kunaṁ panәṇḍasani luṅguhi yakaragaṇa, yapvan ikaṁ raka:ragaṇa la:ghu maḍuḍuk i tṅaḥ, hetunikaṁ śaka:raga
ṇa matyәṅ aguru vkasan· vru pva kita: taka:ra ṅaraniṁ laghu tpi kavurī, ja:tinikaṁ jaka:ragaṇa maṅkana guru riṁ tṅaḥ, bhakti jugaṁ bhaka:ragaṇa riṁ guru sira rumuhun·, na:karaga:ṇa tlv amaduluṙ tika ya laghu paḍa nya laghu karva saṁ guru pasaṅgahanīka śilalo, śeṣaniṅa: ga
2
ṇeki vkasīṁ guru laghu vinuvus·, riṁ haji canda teki yan avas· śiva haji piturun·, saṁ R̥ṣi bhaṅśapatramanitaḥ sira tiki manatha // 0ṙ // nihan gaṇani hayya yeṅtakna, jakara: kalavan· bhakara: śakara, catuṙ laghu guru rva yeka ta lima, lviḥnya guru la:ghu ka:nәm ikahәn·
lavan hana ta matra yeṅtakna, vilaṅnya rikanaṁ sapada matәtәg·, Ikaṁ padha kapuṙvva ka:tlu kunaṁ, gnәp· rvavlas aṅgәpanya tuturan· kapiṁrvanikihәn pva ya vvaluvlas·, tumut limaṁvlas· padhanya vkasan·, tan eva tiya tapa taṙlya vinuvus·, samaṅkana vilaṁni matra nikhihәn· mvaṅ uṅgvanikanaṁ
naṁ jakara: matәtәg·, kapirva maṅnәm· dvitiya kaśulam·, padha rva ya ta hīṅaniṅ vaṅ amilaṁ, kayatnakna saṁ vatәk kavivara trigaṇa guṇa gaṇita ya guṇitan·, prakaraṇa vaṇa karuṇa, Aruṇa daruṇa bharuṇa śaraṇa, Avaraṇa bharaṇa hapaṇa ṇa gәṁ guṇa kuṇi kuṇa
kaṇvi kaṇikhaṇikha len·, ghraṇa hagaṇa ghrahaṇa samiraṇa, praṇava vaṇiya-vaṇiya paṇitaṇitan·, sahaṇa huruta pa:ṇa ṇa giṅa yatika paṇḍita paṇḍava paṇḍura paṇḍu, piṇḍa ṅ apiṇḍa mapaṇḍa mapiṇḍa, laṇḍap alaṇḍәp alaṇḍup aleṇḍo, gaṇḍi-giṇaṇḍī ḍiṇәṇḍa ṇa ma
gәṁ dharaṇa va:raṇa tahaṇa bhaṇa, veśraṇa vaṙṇna vaṇi ṣaṇa kaṙṇna, Aṙṇnava vaṙṇna supaṙṇna yaveṙṇna, veṙṇnata puṙṇnama ghuṙṇnita ṇa gәṁ khagantuṅa deniṁ ṇa gәṁ, ṭā ṭa ḍa ḍa: ṇa riṁ ṇa guṁ, ta tha da dha na riṁ na lit·, vaṙṇna doḥ ya sa savaṙgga liṁ saṁ, ka:vi, voteṁ, maṙgga // //
Uṅgvanikaṁ na litt apaknekī, nda: savaneḥnya rikaṁ paknanta, saṁ na tha maṅkana tekana ḍmit·, kapva masakhya nihan savaneḥnya muni muna nana samanuṣya, Anumana hana namī namī, dina dhana nadi nadha na:na, hani hina tan ana hi:nītuṁ ḥ pranatha natha pratapatini tananya, tanah atunaḥ pina,
tatva ta natanya, nitha vanitha: nini ninī tanu tanī, manana vana: malinī nalih ikahәn· ḥ vaneḥ paknaniṁ na lit·, na:ga punaga na gunuṁ, na:ga nagendra nagendrī, na:gari naga nagini mvahni haghni haghneya, gagana: dhinina: dhana dina, gana va:ṙhana va:hivi va:na, nitinitya yanuṁ na lit i
ka ḥ dahana: jvalana pana, kaminīḥ vahinī ninī, puno vina vani vana, vinavan i na lit ika ḥ saṁkṣepanya yan· vuvusәn·, yavat· rakva R̥bha puṙvva, pa bha ma di kunaṁ puṙvva, dadi na lit· dadi ṇa gәṁ na bhyaktanyan huvas kojar·, kekadeśanya kottaya, kocapa teki śa ṣa sa,
3
bhyaktanya matra vaṙṇnanәn·, śambu śaṅkara śaraḥ śaraṇa śaśī, deśa deśī kaśaśaḥ śavala kaśaḥ, śva:śuci śuna śuraḥ śiva ca śaṇa, śanti śoka paśa śastra śuna śiśuḥ ḥ śamuṙdḍanya, teka: śa kuR̥b umuni vunbunikahәn·, śaśaṅkaḥ śaṅkaḥ śaṅkhara kuśakuśaḥ keśi kuśika, kuśana śreka kro
śaḥ kraniki kata śabdeṁ śīriṇī, śikiṁ keśīkeśa: pr̥śa kuśika keśi kuśakuśa śane śunya śreni gr̥ṇa piśunane śrīhaśa niśa, vinanaśa: mva ma:śa daśadiśi śarat· śura raśika, śiva: śambuḥ śula triśula śuśali śrī vava śiva, śavaḥ vaṅśa: veśaḥ śavari śivira:kaśa śacaya ḥ kṣaṇa kṣi
ṇi kapakṣa lakṣmi ṣaṇaya: hahәmmu: nidi, kagantuṁṅ agumantuṅeṁ ḍa ḍa kanaṁ ṣa pr̥titala, prahr̥ṣṭī parituṣṭa roṣa koṣa kr̥ṣṇa vr̥ṣṭa ṣa lumaḥ ṣa pr̥ttitika mahaṙṣi mahoṣadha meheṣa meṣa nuṣa, R̥ṣaḥ muṣikha puśya poṣyakha puṣaḥ praṣaṣṭa: maṣa, ṣadhaṅguli
ṣadhaṅga bhuṣaṇa ṣubha: ṣaduṙ bha:ṣita, Aṣa: paṣadha yoṣadhipu viṣam· dvipadha:ṣaṇa bhaviṣyati hiriṣya hiṙṣa:ṇa puṣaḥ huṣaḥ ṣaddha len·, viṣa viṣaya yomiśeṣa: dadi ma:nuṣa ka:ṣaya, nyataṁ kaluṣa kīlviṣaṅ aluṣa kaṣmala: ka:maṣa, nyataṁ mami ṣa yoṅgvaniṁ ṣa maR̥
naḥ naṅ inta:ta ya ḥ śa:ka:śa mvaṁ ṣapr̥tvi sadulur ika r̥ṅәn· yekahәn·, vaṙṇnanәn ta, śuśruśa: śiṣya śikṣya śviśita vtunikaṁ haśvaṣa: śeṣa:śeṣa:n·, śuśvat· śiṣinya śośvi śvaṣinaka ṣaśi de ka: vaśiṣṭa śaviṣṭī, maṅka teka:ṁ śaṭavoṙ ṣa taya tiṅtiṅәt· yeki śakṣat· vtunya //
// ma:sa:nikaṁ sa ta nihan· vuvusәn padhanya, sa:dhu sada: sata sabha: sisi ta:sita:sī, sita: susatya rasa satrīya sa:ri saṁ hyaṁ, ⌈svera: sabha:sari sarisati sa:rasari mva: sava: ṅasumatī basusena sunu, mvaṁṅ ekava:sa hupava:sa vinīsavasa, duṙ=bha:si duṙyyasana duṙṅyasa
na prasasta, bya sa:sa sa:du sasivin sapujinsapuja: sasvaṅga saṅga sigi seṅgita saṙgga sajja, sә:gә: sgaṁ siga sugiḥ sigirin saga sor·, sasvaṙgga sa:gara sa:gorava sa:dhaka syaṁ, rat· kosvaniṁ sata sarat· paknanya s·kṣat· ḥ sura sapta saraḥ surasa sira sada, samasiḥ mapasә
n· savara suta saha, savinaṁ savanәn· sakala sakavasa, praja: nanmi sa dantya niti kamivara Itiḥ paruṅguniṅ ha:kṣara // L̥ // nyan sutrasandī vuvusәn·, parakr̥tia lviṙnika pratiṅkaḥnya, Atambayan·, havkasan·, na:han ta ya sinaṅguḥhan· vaṙṇna tiniṅkaḥ pina
4
rva vkasan·, Ikaṁ namaḥ yekhihәn· śvara ṅaranya, yapvan kapuṙvyahanta, sinaṅguhan· vyañjana na:ma L̥, yan ta hadi samana, tumut sinami, I, puṙvyaka, vkasan· ghoṣa, sahle sat rī svi sabatәk·, Ā Ī Ū R̥̄ L̥̄, lviṙnya kavruhana diṙ=gha: ṅaranya manhәr·, A I U R̥ L̥, limaṁ vijī, sahaya,
sandya:kṣara muvah aṅgәpan·, E Ai, O O, nahan· lviṙnya ḥ ka kha: ca kha: ta tha: pa pha:, sakatlu nahan sahayaniṅ aghoṣa, ga gha ṭa di ya ra la va ha, si loṣan· rakva na:manika vaṙgga ṅaranya limalikur·, ka pinakapuṙvyanika ma, mavkasan pinakavkasnya, ka ga khalimanya ya śuddhan·, ra śa ṣa: saha
yanya vuvudhaḥ Anunasika ṁṅa ña na na: ma, Antasta ṅaranikaṁ ya ra la va tuta, Usmana śa ṣa sa: ha simidaḥ, patiṅkaḥniṁ sutrasandike sampun pratyekanikanaṁṅ akṣari riṁ vyañjana lavan· śyara, t ucapa ta sañjatanikahәn·, prakarani ṅaranya kavruhana ṅaraniṅ ulu savaneḥ, makuṭa ruku
h aśra mastaka kapaphala, tijakula śekara maśira, nahan ta parina:maniṁ śr̥ṅga dīṙ=gha: hulu mapalenan·, Utәk lavan· tambara kuñcīr·, majaṭa, hagumbak· jambul aṅurai, syana:mani diṙ=gha: yan· riṁ hulu vindu lavan madana khunaṁ, kunaṁ-kunaṁ len tara lavan· vintaṁ, tilaka titik khaṇi suraha
n·, nahan ta parina:maniṁ nandha nyan taṁ cakra jantra guluṅa:n·, sudaṙṣaṇa yuddhakr̥ṣṇa len sakaṭa, daśana:ma yeki huniṅa:n·, mvaṅ añakra hulu yuktī kavruhana yapyan ikaṁ taliṅa nihan·, kuṇḍala capiṁ sumpiṁ le kaṙṇna, śrota suvәṁ myaṅ iṅtiṅә:t·, phalaga suna:maniṁ taliṅa diṙ=gha: ṅa:
ranya, tulalai, Iku taṅan· vastra len· galah adava:, kirivilī kuñca ya savaneḥ, Asiṅa: dava: diṙ=gha: rakveka Araśukha goduvva keśamavaju, kaṙ=ti kuna śaṅka len kuruṅa:n·, Ikaṁ kalambī lavan hana manuṅgaṁ, mathapatapu hana mapayuṁ, daśana:maniṁ taruṅ a:ranya nahan· yapya
n hatik magaṇitrī lavan gudduha, vaja saharuha, masuratibha:hu, bhamana jnu vaneḥ, visaṙjjaniyeki nahan sabatәk· ma:tī pjaḥ śunya turu kunaṁ, paratrakna bhajra līna guliṅan·, hana marukuḥ len asoṁsoṁ, nahan katṅәn ika: yati ṅa:kәn saṅ añjñaṇanya, matkhәn· gadha śukuśuku, phalupha
lu dana saha gadha, vәntis ya laris ya kakuritan·, Asiṅ a:dava: jәṁnya yeki knakәn· vatәk aluṅid· mvaṁ paṇḍī, curiga: gaḍiṁ candraha:ṣa suṅu tinyun·, sihuṅ u:miṅis·, curik nahan yuktī kakyakyan· śiva:patra ya ta tinamphil·, masidkuṅ a:tyәṅa:n amluk siṅәl·, muṅgv iṁ pataraṇa,
5
n ban·tal karaṅ ulu yaya ta kvakvan·, hana ta hiṙ vḍihan aḍeṁ, kr̥tala bhujaga na:gap·śa pinutәṙnya, kadi vaṅkava: ya lummaṅkuṁ, laras· vinәṇṭaṁnya kakrakran· Aṅkus· galaḥnya bhuṇala, kuku manol sagayuṙ jәṅa:sivur·, pahat· ya tiṙnavanya, nahan pasidkuṁṅ amluk tur·, kukunya tuma
kul kadī krukru hana kaṅ iṇḍit· kuṙ lavak·, hana n pamava gadha: nakakonta, tuhuk limpuṁ kr̥tala paṇḍi curik·, salviṙnikaṁ hiṅuṇḍa, yayanyan· ra jinuñjuṁ hika, saṁ hyaṁ jagatrīpuruṣa, nama sivaya ta ṅhulun·, Amvit umastava kita, Amaṙṇnana vaṙva vtun· guruniṁ jagat kita ya, mulakṣa:
ra gu:ru laghu, matra haṙyya taṅ gaṇa, nahan· ṅaran taneṁ candha kīta maṅkarupa canda, gave titī mvaṁ sloka, ya ta vaṙṇnanīn kyavtun·, ya pinakaṣuluhi rat· lviṙniṁ canda ta ṅaranya, kveḥniṁ vilaṁniṅ akṣara, rikanaṁ pada sayatī, padha ṅaranya sakaṇḍaḥ pataṁ pada saśloka mulanya keṅtakna,
Akṣara tuṅgal iṁ yati, yeka sinaṅguḥh antyanta, rvaṅ akṣara puyakhīḥta tryakṣara madyama nama, pratiṣṭa pataṅ akṣara, śiṣapratiṣṭa yan lima, nmaṅ akṣara jagatrī Uṣṇik ri pituṅ akṣara, vyalu pya ya padanuṣṭup·, vruhati saṅa:ṅ akṣara, sapuluḥ pya si pakṣatī sasambaha pya savlas·,
ryavlas pya ya jagati, Atijagat tigavlas·, sakaṙyyaḥ pad·blas ika sakori ya limavlas·, Aṣṭīḥ nәm·blas ikahәn·, tyaṣṭīḥ nahan pituvlas·, nadruti ya vyaluvlas· si vruddhiḥ ya ta salapan·, rvaṁpuluḥ pya ya nakr̥ti prakr̥ti ya ta salikur·, rvalikur ikaṅ akr̥tīḥ tlulikur iṁ vakr̥tīḥ
, pad·likuṙ suna:makr̥tīḥ, bhakr̥tīḥ ya limalikur·, han utkr̥tiḥ ya nәmlikur· nahan pratiṅkaḥnya, sampun ika, samaṅkana vilaṁniṁ vrutiniṁ canda, yapyan· vliḥ sakeṁ nәmlikur·, ḍaṇḍa rakya ṅaranya, lviḥ saṅkerika, kalalu ṅaranya, ḍaṇḍaka hi ruhunya paduluṙnikaṁ
vr̥tti gnәp·, javajavaniṁ canda sampun enak atut·, dinlīṅakәn· vinlavla, bhyaktanya ya vaṙṇnanәn sumili ṅa:raniṁ laku nihan· naddha, bhadra, bhadrotiḥ, vaṇamr̥gī, vijayantī, tanumaddhya, kusumitagandha, madhukaralalīta, vatapatya, paddhanuṣṭup·, sapantika, kakridhita,
vidyutmala, bha:vacakra, bhramaraviL̥mbita, vikridita, kumaraviL̥mbīta, bhujaṅgasukr̥ta, Ayamuka, turidagatī, Ambәk suda, vahirat·, śadanaśrī, Anuntun·, jayendrabhajra, Upastita, doḥduḥka, śalisir·, vima:la, bhramaravilaśita, śvagata, ratodaka, maduvulamr̥ta,
6
bhikṣuka, drutaviL̥mbita, bhaṅśapatra, vīralalīta, raṣanetra, śrī pucaśa, giriśa, kuśumavicita, citralitī, parajīta, bhujaṅgaprayatna, bhramitakṣa, śatyadevī, navamaliṇī, kuśumapaddhanta, prahasīṇī, śasadana, matha:mayura, sambada, paraṇaśara, praharaṇakalīka, guṇanikara, malī
ṇī, bhaṣantatilakata, mr̥dhukaralalīta, meriṁ, kusumayuddha, jagatpramodhīta, bhujaṅgavilaśīta, gajavilaśīta, mandrakantha, Avitana, śikariṇī, Ariṇīpluta, sapr̥ttitala, kuśumītalata, malaśikikṣaṇa, saṙ=dulavikridhīta, śr̥ddhara, śuvadana, mr̥gaṅśa rajanī, mandharadrī, mandraka hniṁ,
